research.name: Interdisciplinary Institute of Political Economy (IIEP - UBA - CONICET)
research.summary: Currently assisting in projects leveraging unstructured data and Large Language Models (LLMs) to conduct sentiment analysis, with the aim of developing innovative tools for predicting economic upheavals.

research.name: Independent -- joint with Damián Pierri (PhD., Universidad de San Andrés)
research.summary: Actively contributing to projects related to macroeconomics and empirical applications.

teaching.summary: Lead organizer for the New York City branch of the People's Climate March, the largest climate march in history.
highlights: Awarded 'Climate Hero' award by Greenpeace for my efforts organizing the march.
Men of the year 2014 by Time magazine

projects.name: Quantum Computing
projects.summary: Quantum computing is the use of quantum-mechanical phenomena such as superposition and entanglement to perform computation. Computers that perform quantum computations are known as quantum computers.
